name: mesir wat
author: mookman288
description: Mesir Wat or Misir Wat is a rich Ethiopian lentil stew that is often served with Injera bread.
recipe: Heat &$0 in a 4 quart pot on medium heat
Lower heat to low and add &$2, &$3, &$4, &$5, and &$6 to the pot, cooking for 1-2 minutes until fragrant and smooth
Raise heat to high and add &$7 and &$8 to the pot and bring to a boil
Lower heat to low and cover, cooking for 15 minutes
Remove from heat and let sit for an additional 10-15 minutes
